sections.subtitle: Accelerate your research.
sections.body: Find, access and understand datasets and tools across many repositories.

sections.heading: A Data Ecosystem
sections.body: The NIAID Data Ecosystem provides a secure environment to find, access and analyze immune-mediated and infectious disease data to speed the development of diagnostics, therapeutics, and vaccines.

sections.heading: Explore data from many repositories
sections.body: Search simultaneously across millions of publicly available datasets to find immune-mediated and infectious disease data for reanalysis.

sections.heading: Connect to the workspace.
sections.body: Connect to the Analysis Workspace to analyze datasets or to integrate computational tools in your own pipeline.
